description: This file defines the AirflowTools class, which provides methods to save and read Airflow DAG files, and manages the directory where DAGs are stored.

classes.name: AirflowTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing Airflow DAG files, including saving and reading DAG scripts.

methods.name: save_dag_file
methods.description: Saves Python code for an Airflow DAG to a specified file and returns the file path or an error message.

methods.name: read_dag_file
methods.description: Reads the contents of a specified Airflow DAG file and returns its contents or an error message.
